Thao unexpectedly found herself as a single mom of two children all while managing a budding business. But with help from a community that rallied around her, she continues to serve the people of #LA04 at her nail salon.
She and her husband opened TAT Nails in Ville Platte and began building their business. However, personal tragedy struck in 2011.
This week’s #WomensHistoryMonth highlight is Tiffany Thanh Le (better known as Thao) — a Vietnam immigrant who came to the U.S. in hopes of becoming a small business owner. pic.twitter.com/jFuR8Javes
